doc:
Burt Ward https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burt_Ward 0 Burt Ward (born Bert John Gervis Jr. , July 6, 1945) is an American actor and activist best known for his portrayal of Robin, the sidekick of Batman (played by Adam West), in the television series Batman (1966–1968), its theatrical feature film, the 1977 Saturday Morning animated series The New Adventures of Batman, Legends of the Superheroes (1979), and two animated feature films, Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders (2016) and Batman vs. Two-Face (2017). Burt_Ward ( born Bert_John_Gervis_Jr. , July_6_,_1945 ) is an_American_actor_and_activist best_known for his_portrayal of Robin , the_sidekick of Batman ( played by Adam_West ) , in the_television_series_Batman ( 1966 – 1968 ) , its_theatrical_feature_film , the_1977_Saturday_Morning_animated_series The_New_Adventures of Batman , Legends of the_Superheroes ( 1979 ) , and two_animated_feature_films , Batman : Return of the_Caped_Crusaders ( 2016 ) and Batman_vs._Two-Face ( 2017 ) .
